PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_SpaceThermalRequirements
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Properties related to the comfort requirements for thermal and other thermal related performances of spaces that apply to the occurrences of IfcSpace or IfcZone. This includes the required design temperature, humidity, and air conditioning.

PropertyDef.Name: SpaceTemperatureMax
PropertyDef.Definition: Temperature of the space or zone, that is required from user/designer view point. If no summer or winter space temperature requirements are given, it applies all year, otherwise for the intermediate period.

PropertyDef.Name: SpaceTemperatureMin
PropertyDef.Definition: Minimal Temperature of the space or zone, that is required from user/designer view point. It applies all year.

PropertyDef.Name: SpaceTemperatureSummer
PropertyDef.Definition: Temperature of the space or zone for the hot (summer) period, that is required from user/designer view point.

PropertyDef.Name: SpaceTemperatureWinter
PropertyDef.Definition: Temperature of the space or zone for the cold (winter) period, that is required from user/designer view point.

PropertyDef.Name: SpaceHumidity
PropertyDef.Definition: Humidity of the space or zone that is required from user/designer view point. If no summer or winter space humidity requirements are given, it applies all year, otherwise for the intermediate period.

PropertyDef.Name: SpaceHumiditySummer
PropertyDef.Definition: Humidity of the space or zone for the hot (summer) period, that is required from user/designer view point.

PropertyDef.Name: SpaceHumidityWinter
PropertyDef.Definition: Humidity of the space or zone for the cold (winter) period that is required from user/designer view point.

PropertyDef.Name: DiscontinuedHeating
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication whether discontinued heating is required/desirable from user/designer view point. (True) if yes, (FALSE) otherwise.

PropertyDef.Name: AirConditioning
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication whether this space requires air conditioning provided (TRUE) or not (FALSE).

PropertyDef.Name: AirConditioningCentral
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication whether the space requires a central air conditioning provided (TRUE) or not (FALSE). It should only be given, if the property "AirConditioning" is set to TRUE.
